title: Cannot link libsyntax from libtest
body:
Based on current master (9af8d42ec79558225043189e429e9d652ff89eab).

When adding `syntax = { path = "../libsyntax" }` to libtest (`src/libtest/Cargo.toml`), rustc_errors is not able to compile anymore, as it can't find libterm.

```
Compiling rustc_errors v0.0.0 (file:///home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/src/librustc_errors)
error[E0463]: can't find crate for `term`
  --> librustc_errors/lib.rs:23:1
   |
23 | extern crate term;
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ can't find crate

error: aborting due to previous error

error: Could not compile `rustc_errors`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/bootstrap/debug/rustc --crate-name rustc_errors librustc_errors/lib.rs --error-format json --crate-type dylib --emit=dep-info,link -C prefer-dynamic -C opt-level=2 -C metadata=2ade75bd18820c38 -C extra-filename=-2ade75bd18820c38 --out-dir /home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -L dependency=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps -L dependency=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/release/deps --extern unicode_width=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/libunicode_width-fe8d4097179e0a15.rlib --extern serialize=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/libserialize-2fd8757c481652f9.so --extern serialize=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/libserialize-2fd8757c481652f9.rlib --extern rustc_data_structures=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/librustc_data_structures-371d1a5f4b468da7.so --extern syntax_pos=/home/gilnaa/proj/rust-lang/upstream/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0-test/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/release/deps/libsyntax_pos-519cde9a7827a2e4.so` (exit code: 101)
```

Patch:
```
diff --git a/src/libtest/Cargo.toml b/src/libtest/Cargo.toml
index ec77f95338..3e64cefce6 100644
--- a/src/libtest/Cargo.toml
+++ b/src/libtest/Cargo.toml
@@ -11,3 +11,4 @@ crate-type = ["dylib", "rlib"]
 [dependencies]
 getopts = "0.2"
 term = { path = "../libterm" }
+syntax = { path = "../libsyntax" }
```

This is needed in order for libtest to check for nightly-status.
